roleset.name: (cause to) become acid
roleset.note: ACETIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'acetify' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry other_cos-45.4. (from acetify.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: instrument or manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: acetify-v
example.text: The wine or other alcoholic beverage was allowed to remain exposed to the air, where upon film of acetic acid bacteria formed on the surface and acetified the alcohol beneath.
